summary: A photographer feels his commitment to his girlfriend beginning to fade when he becomes obsessed with an enigmatic client.

Kirk|Leslie Lyles|Jamie Richard|Derek Yip|Cheryl Alessio|Courtney Antonioli|Eliza Morales Brown|Shirley Dluginski|Wayne K. Gabriel|Jessica Jones|Kory Kay|Richard N. Wilson
title: Monogamy
